column1: Kata Robata////Tuna Tar Tar($9): This is the very first thing we always order.  We have to order 2 since my 11-year-old daughter eats the whole thing by herself.  Fresh tuna is cubed and mixed with cherry tomatoes and avocado.  I mix soy sauce and wasabi in the dipping dish and pour slowly on top.  If you try to pour soy sauce over it
column2: it will drench the fish and it is just salty.  Enjoy them with Taro and Rencon(Lotus) Chips.  Taro is the ones with spots.  Rencon(Lotus) has holes.
